bio.content: A 19 year old Computer Engineering student at the University of Waterloo. I am passionate about technology and software development, with a keen interest in artificial intelligence and machine learning. I have experience in full stack development and software engineering, and I am always looking to learn and grow in the field. In my free time, I enjoy coding, reading, and exploring new technologies.

work_experience.title: AI Full Stack Software Engineer
work_experience.description: Working on the development of AI-based applications and software solutions. Key responsibilities include developing and implementing new features, conducting code reviews, and optimizing software performance.

work_experience.title: Software Developer
work_experience.description: Developed software solutions for clients, participated in the full software development lifecycle, and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.

education.description: Studying Computer Engineering, currently in coop term just finished 2A term
